body_html:
Thanks @kdubovikov for this PR, and for your interest in the paper!

It's worth noting that Irwan (the paper author) is already mostly done with a change to add these optimizers to GitHub. I would be happy to take this change, but it is complicated due to the fact that most of our supported optimizers require C++ fused implementations for speed and distributed training reasons.

Given that this work is almost done, would you be okay if we closed this PR in favor of the C++ version that is coming soon?
